title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2370.1 - Purpose and scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2370.1 - Purpose and scope

State Regulations

The people's right to know the process of government
decisionmaking and the documents and statistics leading to determinations is
basic to our society. Access to such information should not be thwarted by
shrouding it with the cloak of secrecy or confidentiality. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
2370.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
